title: Friend number incorrectly displaying
body: While using the map, the number of people claimed that there were 5 people online, but showing up on the phone, there were only 4, I checked the actual client and there were still just 4. I think this may be caused by someone previously being online but then logging off? Although I cant say for sure.

replies.body:
Make sure to report through the app as well. 

I'll make a note of this and raise to the team.
